itemDescription: British army officer and special envoy

wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Chandos Blair  & Bar (25 February 1919 – 22 January 2011) was a senior British Army officer who served as General Officer Commanding Scottish Command from 1972 to 1976.

response: *1975–1983: Lt-Gen. Sir Chandos Blair, KCVO, OBE, MC
